overview: This award-winning video provides parents with more than 60 baby and toddler signs and images -- the building blocks needed to learn basic American Sign Language. Baby See 'n' Sign is a first-rate educational tool and can promote communication with Down's Syndrome and autistic kids, as well as hearing, non-hearing, latent-deaf and adopted children from overseas. It's also an excellent source for those learning English as a second language.
title: Baby See 'n Sign: Vol. 1
